key_risks: Retail sector challenges due to shift to online shopping and changing consumer behavior
Office market uncertainty from hybrid and remote work models
Economic sensitivity to Australian economic conditions, interest rates, and inflation
ESG pressures to meet ambitious sustainability targets
controversies: Tenant and investor complaints, potentially impacting tenant retention and investor confidence
Lingering effects of COVID-19 on retail and office portfolios, including tenant stability and rental income
environmental_issues: Pressure to achieve net-zero carbon emissions and water neutrality by 2030
social_issues: Tenant dissatisfaction and disputes over financing arrangements
governance_issues: Need to maintain strong governance to meet ESG targets and manage climate-related risks
